description: Try our easy to follow Easy Pumpkin Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pumpkin,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Easy Pumpkin Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter in a large saucepan on medium. Sauté onion and garlic for 4-5 minutes until softened and starting to colour.
Add pumpkin and Campbell’s vegetable stock. Bring to the boil and simmer, covered for 10 minutes. Cook, further 5-10 minutes, uncovered until pumpkin is tender.
Stand for 5 minutes before processing with a stick blender until smooth. Season to taste.
